refnamediv.refpurpose: Update the current session id with a newly generated one

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: session_regenerate_id will replace the current session id with a new one, and keep the current session information.

example.title: A session_regenerate_id example
example.programlisting:
"; print "New Session: $new_sessionid
"; print_r($_SESSION); ?>

note.para: As of PHP 4.3.3, if session cookies are enabled, use of session_regenerate_id will also submit a new session cookie with the new session id.

refsect1.para: See also session_id, session_start, and session_name.
